scan_metadata.description: networkfirewall - Compliance Functions Mapping - OPTIMIZED VERSION
scan_metadata.optimization_notes: Intelligently categorized functions by cloud security expert analysis, grouped by service, simplified to 4 clear categories with execution types and remediation effort classification

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check if deletion protection is enabled
check_functions.description: Checks if deletion protection is enabled for firewall

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check firewall presence in all VPCs
check_functions.description: Verifies firewall is present in all VPCs

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check if logging is enabled
check_functions.description: Checks if logging is enabled for firewall

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check if firewall is multi-AZ
check_functions.description: Verifies firewall is deployed in multi-AZ mode

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check default action for fragmented packets
check_functions.description: Checks default action for fragmented packets in policy

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check default action for full packets
check_functions.description: Checks default action for full packets in policy

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check if rule group is associated with policy
check_functions.description: Verifies rule group association with firewall policy
